name: ExploreYogaTherapy
0:
”Alexa, launch Explore Yoga Therapy”
”Alexa, open Explore Yoga Therapy”
”Alexa, start Explore Yoga Therapy”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: explore yoga therapy
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This voice experience is the official voice app of Explore Yoga Therapy. At Explore we work together to find solutions that go beyond your yoga mat.
Your wellness is multifaceted and so is our approach. 

Everyone is a candidate for yoga therapy. Regardless of age or physical ability, this approach meets you where you are and empowers you with tools to get where you want to go.

Let’s work together to explore the yoga-based practices that will support you in achieving your unique health and wellness goals.

Heal, grow and transform through this mind-body approach that addresses the needs of the whole person, rather than an isolated symptom or condition.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
